live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50756.summary: Some customers located between 47 Ave and 60 Ave area of Beaumont are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50756.title: Jun 17 - Beaumont (Between 47 Ave and 60 Ave) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
